distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for ghostscript fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-52722: Do not allow eexec seeds other than the Type 1 standard while using SAFER mode (bsc#1223852).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: An issue was discovered in Artifex Ghostscript through 10.01.0. psi/zmisc1.c, when SAFER mode is used, allows eexec seeds other than the Type 1 standard.
notes.title: CVE description
